com.krupizde.main

Class InstagramCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.krupizde.main.InstagramCrawler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class InstagramCrawler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class represents separate thread for crawnling through instagram profiles and their posts. It is a separate thread for future paralelization with downloading and other actions.
    Author:
    Zdeněk Krupička (radamanak@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstagramCrawler

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Main thread method that loads profiles from database, and iterates through them. Each profile is searched through api and their feed is returned. Because of instagram api pagination there are multiple feed searches executed with next max_post_id. If there is already medium with returned id in the database, feed loading for given user is stoped and next user is being loaded. If fullFinished flag of user is false (application was interupter or profile wasn't loaded yet) and there are already some posts of this profile in database, loading of this profile's feed is started over again, because that is a flag that the application was interrupted in the middle of loading this profile's posts and not all of them were loaded.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • loadProfiles

        private java.util.List<Profile> loadProfiles(DaoUserProfiles uDao)
        Method loads all profiles from database and returns them as a list
        Parameters:
        uDao - Dao object for profiles
        Returns:
        List of profiles from database if possible. Null otherwise.

      • addNormalPost

        private boolean addNormalPost(org.brunocvcunha.instagram4j.requests.payload.InstagramFeedItem feedResult,
                              DaoMedium mDao,
                              Profile profile)
        Method to load and save to database a normal picture/video post that InstagramFeedResult returned.
        Parameters:
        feedResult - The post InstagramFeedResult returned
        mDao - Dao object for saving the picture/video of this post
        profile - Profile of which the post is part of
        Returns:
        True if post was succesfully saved, false if not (post id is already saved)

      • addMultiPost

        private boolean addMultiPost(org.brunocvcunha.instagram4j.requests.payload.InstagramFeedItem feedResult,
                             DaoMedium mDao,
                             Profile profile)
        Method to save all pictures/photos from one multi-post.
        Parameters:
        feedResult - The multi-post InstagramFeedResult returned
        mDao - Dao object for saving all the pictures/videos of this multi-post
        profile - Profile of which the multi-post is part of
        Returns:
        True if all succesfully added, false otherwise

      • getDateCreated

        private java.util.Date getDateCreated(org.brunocvcunha.instagram4j.requests.payload.InstagramFeedItem feedResult)
        Method extracts date of the post creation from InstagramFeedItem
        Parameters:
        feedResult - The post InstagramFeedResult returned
        Returns:
        Date of the post creation. If not possible, returns default time (1.1.1970)
